issue.title: [Python] StructFieldOptions not exposed
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14765](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14765). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Good thing that the test suite emits a warning for us :-)

```Java

pyarrow/compute.py:157
  /home/antoine/arrow/dev/python/pyarrow/compute.py:157: RuntimeWarning: Python binding for StructFieldOptions not exposed
    warnings.warn("Python binding for {} not exposed"

```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14765?focusedCommentId=17445921) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
`[~alenkaf]` Perhaps you'd be interested in this issue. This involves writing Cython code and some basic understanding of C++.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14765?focusedCommentId=17445922) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Oh, my bad. Let me hook this up.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14765?focusedCommentId=17445923) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Oh, or Alenka can take it!

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14765?focusedCommentId=17446840) by Alenka Frim (alenka):*
Hey, missed this, sry. I'll take it! (y)

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14765?focusedCommentId=17448973) by Alenka Frim (alenka):*
Will finish the PR once https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14853 is resolved.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14765?focusedCommentId=17451092) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11765
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11765>
